channel.title: learn on A Hugo website
channel.description: Recent content in learn on A Hugo website

item.title: Git help
item.description: git is used to save our codes in the cloud. - working directory staging area(index). connect the staging area with the repository. git repository git basic git init will generate a file called /.git/ used ls -a to see save some basic utility. git add change the files from working directory to staging area. git commit put into the repository. git status: 1. Changes to be commited working directory has the same files as the index 2.

item.title: Blog Down
item.description: get start: hugo go: config Content Front matter Templates _default/list.html: terms.html Partials/ .stores the templates reused in other html pages by the {{ partial }} function. footer.html Custom layouts Static files Lastly Addin â€¦. get start: here we go. already started hugo go: a tool we we can leverage to generate the static website.
